scenes.description: Kiara finishes her conversation with Calli and Gura, spelling out 'Auf Wiedersehen' for them before they leave.
Kiara transitions to her next song performance.
Kiara performs her original song 'Heart Challenger'.

subtitles.original: Beep that out.
subtitles.english: Beep that out.

subtitles.original: Beep that out whoever's editing this.
subtitles.english: Beep that out whoever's editing this.

subtitles.original: It's okay, on my channel it's allowed. Yeah.
subtitles.english: It's okay, on my channel it's allowed. Yeah.

subtitles.original: Okay.
subtitles.english: Okay.

subtitles.original:
Well, you know what? I said double down,
but I'm still gonna treat you for dinner. Yay!
subtitles.english:
Well, you know what? I said double down,
but I'm still gonna treat you for dinner. Yay!

subtitles.original: Yay! Thank you!
subtitles.english: Yay! Thank you!

subtitles.original:
Winner winner chicken dinner from the chicken,
as in the chicken is the dinner's from the chicken...
subtitles.english:
Winner winner chicken dinner from the chicken,
as in the chicken is the dinner's from the chicken...

subtitles.original:
...not the dinner is...
it doesn't mean that the dinner is um, a chicken.
subtitles.english:
...not the dinner is...
it doesn't mean that the dinner is um, a chicken.

subtitles.original: That's true.
subtitles.english: That's true.

subtitles.original:
It's... it's from the chicken,
so winner winner... chicken...
subtitles.english:
It's... it's from the chicken,
so winner winner... chicken...

subtitles.original: Mm-hmm.
subtitles.english: Mm-hmm.

subtitles.original:
...I'll shut the fuck up now.
Thank you Kiara, happy birthday!
subtitles.english:
...I'll shut the fuck up now.
Thank you Kiara, happy birthday!

subtitles.original: Thank you! I'll bring you some KFC later.
subtitles.english: Thank you! I'll bring you some KFC later.

subtitles.original: Wait, what's the answer?
subtitles.english: Wait, what's the answer?

subtitles.original: Yeah, you can't just leave us hanging.
subtitles.english: Yeah, you can't just leave us hanging.

subtitles.original: Oh, okay. It's A-U-F...
subtitles.english: Oh, okay. It's A-U-F...

subtitles.original: Spell it!
subtitles.english: Spell it!

subtitles.original: SPACE W-I-E-D-E-R-S-E-H-E-N!
subtitles.english: SPACE W-I-E-D-E-R-S-E-H-E-N!

subtitles.original: Oh, Auf... Auf Wiedersehen!
subtitles.english: Oh, Auf... Auf Wiedersehen!

subtitles.original:
And perfectly, since I just spelled it out,
I will say to you girls, Auf Wiedersehen! Bye-bye!
subtitles.english:
And perfectly, since I just spelled it out,
I will say to you girls, Auf Wiedersehen! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: Bye-bye! Auf Wiedersehen!
subtitles.english: Bye-bye! Auf Wiedersehen!

subtitles.original:
Next time ask me to spell 'Schreckt'.
It's a lot actually more difficult.
subtitles.english:
Next time ask me to spell 'Schreckt'.
It's a lot actually more difficult.

subtitles.original: Oh yeah.
subtitles.english: Oh yeah.

subtitles.original: Bye-bye! Happy Birthday!
subtitles.english: Bye-bye! Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: Alright, on to the next song! Let's go!
subtitles.english: Alright, on to the next song! Let's go!

subtitles.original: Heart Challenger / Takanashi Kiara
subtitles.english: Heart Challenger / Takanashi Kiara

subtitles.original:
Alright guys, no time for a break.
Here comes: Heart Challenger! Let's go!
subtitles.english:
Alright guys, no time for a break.
Here comes: Heart Challenger! Let's go!

subtitles.original: ドキドキ 止まらない
subtitles.english: My heart won't stop throbbing

subtitles.original: もうすぐ 乙女の勇気
subtitles.english: Very soon, a maiden's courage

subtitles.original: ちょこっと 必要なの
subtitles.english: Just a little bit of it will be needed

subtitles.original: 期待でパンクしたい
subtitles.english: I want to burst with expectation

subtitles.original: 甘くて ほろ苦い
subtitles.english: Sweet and bittersweet

subtitles.original: 切ない 君への気持ち
subtitles.english: My painful feelings for you

subtitles.original: Make me, made me コスチュームチェンジ
subtitles.english: Make me, made me, costume change

subtitles.original: お気に入りに着替えて
subtitles.english: Changing into my favorite outfit

subtitles.original: 鼻くすぐる香りに
subtitles.english: With a scent that tickles my nose

subtitles.original: ハートときめいちゃう
subtitles.english: My heart starts fluttering

subtitles.original: Let's start! つくるよ
subtitles.english: Let's start! I'm going to make it

subtitles.original: ラブ込めて とびきりのチョコレート
subtitles.english: With all my love, an extraordinary chocolate

subtitles.original: 燃えそうで ギュッと握ったら
subtitles.english: If I grip it tight, feeling like it's burning

subtitles.original: 未完成の合図
subtitles.english: A sign of being incomplete

subtitles.original: カラフルな恋の味
subtitles.english: The taste of a colorful love

subtitles.original: 溶けちゃう前に受け取って Please
subtitles.english: Please take it before it melts

subtitles.original: 鳴り響く鐘の音
subtitles.english: The sound of the ringing bells

subtitles.original: 校舎の窓辺で 二人
subtitles.english: The two of us by the school window

subtitles.original: ねえ 早く言わなくちゃ
subtitles.english: Hey, I have to tell you quickly

subtitles.original: 照れちゃうけど「好きです」
subtitles.english: It's embarrassing, but "I like you"

subtitles.original: この思い 君まで届け
subtitles.english: Let these feelings reach you

subtitles.original: With me!
subtitles.english: With me!

subtitles.original: チクタク 進んでく
subtitles.english: Tick-tock, time keeps ticking away

subtitles.original: 気持ちは 止められないの
subtitles.english: I can't stop my feelings

subtitles.original: ちょこっと 勇気出して
subtitles.english: I'll muster up a little courage

subtitles.original: 贈るよ ラブレター
subtitles.english: And give you my love letter

subtitles.original: 大好き なのに
subtitles.english: Even though I love you so much

subtitles.original: 何十回 書いても
subtitles.english: No matter how many times I write it

subtitles.original: 伝えきれない Make me, make me
subtitles.english: I can't fully express it, make me, make me

subtitles.original: 意気地なしなんて 空の彼方飛んでいけ
subtitles.english: My cowardice, fly away beyond the sky

subtitles.original: 何度もチェックして
subtitles.english: I check it over and over again

subtitles.original: 君に会う時は
subtitles.english: When I meet you

subtitles.original: 100倍増しで
subtitles.english: I want to be a hundred times

subtitles.original: 可愛くなりたいの 鏡の前 にらめっこ
subtitles.english: more cute, staring at myself in the mirror

subtitles.original: Let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: いつもと違うスウィートさで
subtitles.english: With a sweetness different from usual

subtitles.original: ハートを虜にしたい
subtitles.english: I want to captivate your heart

subtitles.original: ぐるぐる 変えてみても
subtitles.english: Even if I try changing it again and again

subtitles.original: 髪型が 決まらない
subtitles.english: I can't decide on a hairstyle

subtitles.original: 告白のシミュレーション
subtitles.english: Simulation of a confession

subtitles.original: ドキドキ 騒ぎ出しちゃう
subtitles.english: My heart starts making a commotion

subtitles.original: 月より願い込めて
subtitles.english: I'll put my wish on the moon

subtitles.original: 一発勝負 明日は
subtitles.english: A one-shot chance, tomorrow

subtitles.original: 絶対に晴れますように
subtitles.english: I hope it will definitely be sunny

subtitles.original: And I'm here to tell you that I love you through and through
subtitles.english: And I'm here to tell you that I love you through and through

subtitles.original: There's no one else in this world that I would trade for you
subtitles.english: There's no one else in this world that I would trade for you
